data.title: Samuel Herbert "Sam" Scott, Jr. Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Samuel H. "Sam" Scott, Jr., age 85, of Paris, TN, died Tuesday, December 19, 2023, at AHC of Paris. He retired after 30 years from the State of Connecticut as a mechanic.  Sam w...
data.text:
Samuel H. “Sam” Scott, Jr., age 85, of Paris, TN, died Tuesday, December 19, 2023, at AHC of Paris.

He retired after 30 years from the State of Connecticut as a mechanic. Sam was a lifelong resident of Connecticut who retired to Tennessee two years ago. He served in the U.S. Army Reserves and enjoyed Ford trucks.

Sam was born March 11, 1938, in Botsford, CT, to the late Samuel H. Scott, Sr., and the late Helen Sedor Scott.

He is survived by one daughter, Stephanie (Thomas) Heneghan of Paris.

In addition to his parents, he was also preceded in death by one sister, Nancy Slocum; and one brother, George Scott.

Arrangements are being handled by Ridgeway Funeral Home, 201 Dunlap Street/PO Box 788, Paris, TN 38242. The body is to be cremated with no public services planned.
